description:
When D`Artagnan went to Tokyo for a little fun, she spotted an unforgettable sight: Lucifer singing while basking in moonlight in a park. From that moment, no matter if she was asleep or awake, D`Artagnan`s heart would not stop throbbing for some reason.
One day, D`Artagnan sees a concert by the popular idol act Angely Diva at her friend Izumo`s invitation. There, she resolved to follow her idol dreams, and the story of song and miracles begins.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
- "Those pop idols were amazing. I couldn`t stop looking at them..." -
D`Artagnyan goes about her everyday life until she makes a trip to Tokyo.
There, she spots Lucy singing alone in the moonlight. Unable to forget the incredible sight,
D`Artagnyan`s friend Izumo invites her to see a concert featuring the popular Angelic Divas.
Little did she know, that experience would completely change D`Artagnyan`s life!

-Starting today... I`m going to be an idol!-
To start her new life as a pop idol, D`Artagnyan moves to a dormitory in the city.
There, she meets Mustang, Nonno, Alice, and all the rest of the older idols,
who tell D`Artagnyan about her legendary roommate.
But what kind of person will she be?

titles.title: 最強のルームメイト 紫苑!

REGULAR.description:
Wouldn`t it be amazing if Shion and I made our own group?
But Shion is so much better than me...
To survive as a pop idol, you have to team up. At least, that`s what Nonno told D`Artagnyan.
Now D`Artagnyan wants to join up with Shion, but something strange happens when she sees a day on the job with Nobunaga, The
Demon King of the 6th Heaven!

- MSonic! The rock and idol event where anything can happen!
And when one becomes all, truly amazing things come to light! -
D`Artagnyan decides she`s not going to be beaten by Shion and starts to train.
Shion sees this and starts to train alongside her.
Soon after, they catch word about a music festival called MSonic! and decide to team up and try out.
They`re right in the middle of their audition, when suddenly...

- Two for all! -
MSonic is right around the corner.
Unable to perfect Sonic Fever in practice, D`Artagnyan`s nerves show.
Shion encourages her.
At the same time, the Wicked Pistols take the stage.
Will Two for All be able to succeed?

SPECIAL.description:
"Change the world with music? Foolish."
Lucy`s world stops after her band disbands. Meaningless days pass, until she meets her cousin Lucifer and his bandmate Ibaraki Doji. They ask her to join their indie band, the "Wicked Pistols".
Lucifer talks about his dream of going major after winning the MONSTERS ROCK competition, only for Lucy to reject him outright. However, Lucy`s heart begins to thaw after a certain event...

titles.title: A Rhapsody Called Lucy: The Very First Song
Senritsu no Lucifer: Tada Hitotsu no Hajimari no Uta
センリツのルシファー ただひとつの始まりの歌

WIKIPEDIA_JP: モンソニ!_ダルタニャンのアイドル宣言

titles.title: Monster Sonic! D`Artagnan no Idol Sengen
Monster Sonic! D`Artagnyan`s Rise to Fame
モンソニ! ダルタニャンのアイドル宣言
